nodes.text: The Flail hideout was located on the planet Talus during the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, it was the headquarters of the Flail, a terrorist organization that appeared on Coruscant during the Old Republic. Circa 1 ABY, the Corellian Security Force finally discovered the location of the Flail hideout. CorSec troops and Flail cutthroats then battled in the valley leading to the hideout.
